description:
App2World agency provides the full-stack service of mobile & web applications UX/UI design for such segments as business, start-ups or private clients.
We apply only the latest design standards and techniques and are always open for cutting edge solutions.
We can surely turn your ideas into outstanding iOS, Android or Web applications. Our team of skilled developers, out of the box thinking designers and responsible managers takes all the challenges of any complexity and provides best solutions to our customers. 
We start with an idea, taking into account all the requirements, divide the project into some parts (iterations) that will best go with your methodology of project management and start getting the project off the ground. 
We make the process of communication very easy and comfortable using skype, email, phone calls or live meetings.
We've experienced in different fields: Medicine, Social, Financial, Tools, The Web for brands.
